issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

I have a button that has both a backgroundImage and a backgroundDisabledImage. When the button is added to a window, enabling/disabling the button works as expected. When it's added to the toolbar, the button image doesn't get refreshed. I've tried setting the toolbar to null and then setting it again, but no success. Here is some code I've tried: http://gist.github.com/434467

Note: this used to work in Titanium 1.2.0.

{html}
fields.summary: Disable button in toolbar doesn't refresh button

comments.body:
{html}

I don't see an option to close this bug, but it should be closed, this is a duplicate of #1152 - which was fixed in 1.3.2

{html}

{html}

Duplicate of #1152: Has been resolved.
